text: cea midi mxng du brrda phu thi xxk cak ban khxng phwk khea dxk hrux doythi phwk khea mi canwn pen phan«khn thangni pheraa klaw khwam tay læ wxallxhˌ kdi prakasit kæ phwk khea wa phwk cea cng tay seiytheid phayhlang phraxngkh thrng hı phwk khea mi chiwit khun hım thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phu mi buy khun kæ mnusʹy tæthwa mnusʹy swn mak mi khxbphrakhun
